info.name: High Visibility Background Tabs - Firefox 29-56
info.description:
ATTENTION FIREFOX 57 USERS: If your tab bar background is too dark, try installing a theme as the first step since that is the simplest approach: https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/themes/.

ATTENTION FIREFOX 29-56 USERS WITH STYLISH 3.0.1: You can roll back to Stylish 2.1.1 here: https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/stylish/versions/.

Outline on background tabs and bright background behind the favicon and text.
info.additionalInfo:
Too bright? Check out these related styles:
  • Same color as when hovered with the mouse - Brighter background tabs
  • Outline only (transparent background) - Outline background tabs
Background images derived from images shipped with Firefox subject to the Mozilla Public License:
  • chrome://browser/skin/tabbrowser/tab-background-start.png
  • chrome://browser/skin/tabbrowser/tab-background-middle.png
  • chrome://browser/skin/tabbrowser/tab-background-end.png
